## Flyout class

Class for a flyout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class Flyout extends DeleteArea implements IFlyout 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [DeleteArea](./blockly.deletearea_class.md)

<b>Implements:</b> [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addBlockListeners\_(root, block, rect)](./blockly.flyout_class.addblocklisteners__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Add listeners to a block that has been added to the flyout. |
|  [blockIsRecyclable\_(\_block)](./blockly.flyout_class.blockisrecyclable__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Returns whether the given block can be recycled or not. |
|  [createDom(tagName)](./blockly.flyout_class.createdom_1_method.md) |  | Creates the flyout's DOM. Only needs to be called once. The flyout can either exist as its own SVG element or be a g element nested inside a separate SVG element. |
|  [createRect\_(block, x, y, blockHW, index)](./blockly.flyout_class.createrect__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create and place a rectangle corresponding to the given block. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.flyout_class.dispose_1_method.md) |  | Dispose of this flyout. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [getFlyoutScale()](./blockly.flyout_class.getflyoutscale_1_method.md) |  | Get the scale (zoom level) of the flyout. By default, this matches the target workspace scale, but this can be overridden. |
|  [getHeight()](./blockly.flyout_class.getheight_1_method.md) |  | Get the height of the flyout. |
|  [getWidth()](./blockly.flyout_class.getwidth_1_method.md) |  | Get the width of the flyout. |
|  [getWorkspace()](./blockly.flyout_class.getworkspace_1_method.md) |  | Get the workspace inside the flyout. |
|  [getX()](./blockly.flyout_class.getx_1_method.md) |  | Calculates the x coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [getY()](./blockly.flyout_class.gety_1_method.md) |  | Calculates the y coordinate for the flyout position. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.flyout_class.hide_1_method.md) |  | Hide and empty the flyout. |
|  [init(targetWorkspace)](./blockly.flyout_class.init_1_method.md) |  | Initializes the flyout. |
|  [initFlyoutButton\_(button, x, y)](./blockly.flyout_class.initflyoutbutton__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Initialize the given button: move it to the correct location, add listeners, etc. |
|  [isDragTowardWorkspace(currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.flyout_class.isdragtowardworkspace_1_method.md) |  | Determine if a drag delta is toward the workspace, based on the position and orientation of the flyout. This is used in determineDragIntention\_ to determine if a new block should be created or if the flyout should scroll. |
|  [isVisible()](./blockly.flyout_class.isvisible_1_method.md) |  | Is the flyout visible? |
|  [layout\_(contents, gaps)](./blockly.flyout_class.layout__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Lay out the blocks in the flyout. |
|  [moveRectToBlock\_(rect, block)](./blockly.flyout_class.moverecttoblock__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Move a rectangle to sit exactly behind a block, taking into account tabs, hats, and any other protrusions we invent. |
|  [position()](./blockly.flyout_class.position_1_method.md) |  | Position the flyout. |
|  [positionAt\_(width, height, x, y)](./blockly.flyout_class.positionat__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Update the view based on coordinates calculated in position(). |
|  [reflow()](./blockly.flyout_class.reflow_1_method.md) |  | Reflow blocks and their mats. |
|  [reflowInternal\_()](./blockly.flyout_class.reflowinternal__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Compute height of flyout. Position mat under each block. For RTL: Lay out the blocks right-aligned. |
|  [scrollToStart()](./blockly.flyout_class.scrolltostart_1_method.md) |  | Scroll the flyout to the beginning of its contents. |
|  [setContainerVisible(visible)](./blockly.flyout_class.setcontainervisible_1_method.md) |  | Set whether this flyout's container is visible. |
|  [setMetrics\_(xyRatio)](./blockly.flyout_class.setmetrics__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Sets the translation of the flyout to match the scrollbars. |
|  [setVisible(visible)](./blockly.flyout_class.setvisible_1_method.md) |  | Set whether the flyout is visible. A value of true does not necessarily mean that the flyout is shown. It could be hidden because its container is hidden. |
|  [show(flyoutDef)](./blockly.flyout_class.show_1_method.md) |  | Show and populate the flyout. |
|  [wheel\_(e)](./blockly.flyout_class.wheel__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Scroll the flyout. |
